main.name: Jeffrey Su
main.description: Currently a undergraduate student at UC Irvine and currently seeking an internship for Summer 2020. You can usually find me coding, eating food, or watching movies!
main.bio: Currently a Computer Science Student at UC Irvine, seeking internship for Summer 2020. Speicalizing in General and Intelligent Systems and UC Irvine. Familiar with React, Javascript, Full Stack Development.
main.contactmessage: Here is where you should write your message to readers to have them get in contact with you.

education.description: BS in Computer Science, HackUCI Educational Hack Winner, Dean's Honor Roll

work.title: Software Engineering Intern
work.description: Worked on a Full Stack application which allowed data scientists to quickly train NLP datasets. Implemented a Job Queue system that allows for multiple jobs to be trained at the same time on multiple GPU machines. Built using ReactJS for front-end, Flask as the backend, MongoDB as the database, and Docker for multi-server support

work.title: Software Engineering Intern
work.description: Implemented tracking pixels onto ticket selling websites. Helped modify HTML/CSS on websites for a more consistent design. Built a 404 Error Page and Login Page for their websites.

work.title: Software Engineering Intern
work.description: Developed a Full Stack application that enabled global investigators to easily identify money laundering activities between multiple accounts. Built using ReactJS for front-end, Spring Boot as middleware, and Couchbase as the database. Mainly used Semantic UI to build user interface.

work.title: Software Engineering Intern
work.description: Developed rigorous automated testing ruby scripts that were used to test their beta product. Can proficiently use Selenium Cucumber to run web automation programs.

projects.title: Code Climbers
